title: Average price for properties for sale in Rome , Italy 2019 , by area
yAxis: Price in euros per square meter
summary: As of 2019 , Centro_Storico was the most populated Area in the Rome , with 7817 million euros .
That was over 800,000 euros more than runner-up Aventino_San_Saba_Caracalla , the Area in which also the capital Amsterdam is located .
That year , Amsterdam 's population alone made up 863,000 of Aventino_San_Saba_Caracalla 's nearly 6910 million euros .

data.Area: Corso Francia Vigna Clara Fleming Ponte Milvio

gold: The statistic shows the average price for houses , apartments and residential real estate for sale in selected areas of the Italian city of Rome as of December 2019 . According to the data , the sale price in the historic city center ( Centro Storico ) amounted to over 7.8 thousand euros per square meter .
